basics.name: DJZK
basics.label: Developer, Sound Engineer, Music Producer, DJ
basics.summary: Hello! My name is ZK and I am currently working as an IT Support under Alfamart Trading Philippines. I am currently developing small enterprise solutions by utilizing Google's Suite while still supporting the office. I use FL Studio as my main tool on both Sound Engineering and Music Producing. I currently have Producer Edition License on FL Studio 21.
